data.lyric:
[ti:Wine, Beer, Whiskey (Radio Edit)]
[ar:Little Big Town]
[al:Wine, Beer, Whiskey (Radio Edit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Wine, Beer, Whiskey (Radio Edit) - Little Big Town
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：Jimi Westbrook/Phillip Sweet/Sean McConnell/Tofer Brown/Kimberly Schlapman/Karen Fairchild
[00:00.47]Composed by：Jimi Westbrook/Phillip Sweet/Sean McConnell/Tofer Brown/Kimberly Schlapman/Karen Fairchild
[00:00.71]1 2
[00:02.42]Come there's every pound down
[00:05.75]Woo
[00:09.17]Oh yeah
[00:12.05]My friend named Jack he's got my back
[00:17.91]He always seems to know right where I'm at
[00:21.22]My friend Jose he likes to play
[00:27.12]He's always up for anything I say woo
[00:31.37]Little bit of red uh huh
[00:33.51]A lotta bit of crown oh yeah
[00:35.69]Don't matter what it is I'm gonna drink it down down down
[00:40.41]The wine the beer the whiskey
[00:44.94]Are the only things that fix me
[00:49.35]I'm not sayin' it's a problem
[00:51.71]I can stop it if I wanna
[00:53.89]But the wine the beer the whiskey
[00:58.39]They always get me
[01:01.12]Uh huh
[01:06.41]My friend named Gin she's got some friends
[01:11.77]I'm talkin' brandy Sherry and their brother Jim
[01:15.41]My friend the Captain we call him morgan
[01:20.73]He likes to anchor down and hang over 'til mornin'
[01:25.66]Little bit of red uh huh
[01:27.88]A lotta bit of white oh yeah
[01:29.99]Don't matter what it is it's gonna make it all alright
[01:35.10]The wine the beer the whiskey
[01:39.35]Are the only things that fix me
[01:43.77]I'm not sayin' it's a problem
[01:46.03]I can stop it if I wanna
[01:48.20]But the wine the beer the whiskey
[01:52.69]They always get me
[01:58.31]Woo
[02:02.47]Oh yeah alright
[02:06.81]Woo
[02:09.75]My friend named Tito he's my amigo
[02:15.13]I'm gonna follow him around wherever he go woo
[02:20.46]The wine the beer the whiskey
[02:24.57]Yeah I got all my friends here with me
[02:29.04]I'm not sayin' it's a problem
[02:31.30]I can stop it if I wanna
[02:34.43]But who would wanna
[02:35.92]When the wine the beer the whiskey
[02:40.20]They always get me
[02:44.67]They always get me they always get me
[02:53.24]They always
[02:53.93]They always get me
data.trans:
[ti:Wine, Beer, Whiskey (Radio Edit)]
[ar:Little Big Town]
[al:Wine, Beer, Whiskey (Radio Edit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.71]//
[00:02.42]来 钱都在这里
[00:05.75]//
[00:09.17]//
[00:12.05]我的朋友叫做Jack Daniel's 他会支持我
[00:17.91]他好像总是知道我在什么地方
[00:21.22]我的朋友Jose Cuervo 他喜欢玩乐
[00:27.12]不管我说什么 他都不会反驳
[00:31.37]来点红酒
[00:33.51]加很多Crown Royal威士忌
[00:35.69]不管那是什么 我就要通通喝掉
[00:40.41]红酒 啤酒 威士忌
[00:44.94]是唯一能给我慰藉的东西
[00:49.35]我并没有说这是个问题
[00:51.71]只要我想戒 随时都可以
[00:53.89]但是 红酒 啤酒 威士忌
[00:58.39]它们总是让我不能自已
[01:01.12]//
[01:06.41]我的朋友叫做金酒 她也有一些朋友
[01:11.77]我说的是白兰地 雪莉酒 以及他们的兄弟占边威士忌
[01:15.41]我的朋友是个船长 我们叫他摩根
[01:20.73]他喜欢饮酒作乐 彻夜狂欢 直到清晨
[01:25.66]来点红酒
[01:27.88]加很多白酒
[01:29.99]不在乎那是什么 反正喝了就会很快乐
[01:35.10]红酒 啤酒 威士忌
[01:39.35]是唯一能给我慰藉的东西
[01:43.77]我并没有说这是个问题
[01:46.03]只要我想戒 随时都可以
[01:48.20]但是 红酒 啤酒 威士忌
[01:52.69]它们总是让我不能自已
[01:58.31]//
[02:02.47]好的
[02:06.81]//
[02:09.75]我的朋友叫做Tito 他是我的好朋友
[02:15.13]不管他去哪里 我都要跟他走
[02:20.46]红酒 啤酒 威士忌
[02:24.57]我所有的朋友都在我身边
[02:29.04]我并没有说这是个问题
[02:31.30]只要我想戒 随时都可以
[02:34.43]但谁愿意呢
[02:35.92]红酒 啤酒 威士忌 多美味啊
[02:40.20]它们总是让我不能自已
[02:44.67]它们总是让我不能自已
[02:53.24]它们总是
[02:53.93]它们总是让我不能自已
